text: Magnus Hall (born 1959) is a Swedish business executive and the current CEO of Vattenfall; he has served as the company's CEO since October 2014. Prior to this, he served from 2004-2014 as CEO of Holmen. From 2001-2004 he was CEO of Holmen's paper products division; he began his career with Holmen Paper in 1987, after a two-year stint at Holmens Bruk. He graduated from the Linköping Institute of Technology and Georgetown University (on the Fulbright Scholarship).https://corporate.vattenfall.com/about- vattenfall/organisation/group-management/magnus-hall/ Vattenfall ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish chief executives Category:Vattenfall Category:Fulbright Scholars
title: Magnus Hall
